data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Test::Simple is the simplest possible testing module. It exports a
    single function, ok() which does one thing.

    Inside the Test-Simple tarball are...

    Test::More. which is just more ways to say ok.

    Test::Builder, which is a class upon which you can build more test
    libraries (such as Test::More and Test::Simple).

    Future versions may split Test::Builder out into its own tarball.
